channel.title: Zod the immortal's sword
channel.description:
Hello, i am Claunchii i havent posted a model or made a model in a long time. This is the sword of Zod the immortal off the anime/manga Berzerk. The next sword i will make is Gutz's sword from the anime. Please keep in mind that they are anime's so the sword's arent suppose to look like they wouldn't break. (Next is for you to know how i made so you can help me fix any errors with my modeling :) ) First i sketched out the sword's blade and extruded the blade then rotated it till it looked suitable. Then i mirrored the blade X, Y or Z i can't remember, and it looked like a suitable blade i then adjusted the top and bottem so they looked more conjurent. After that i Beveled the outside of blade so it had a smoother appearance. Then i went onto the hilt, I made a primative of a box and shaped and rotated until it looked suitable and beveled accordingly. The handle and "jewel" are self explainitory. Approximate time : 25 minutes.
Also i do not like metaseq, can someone tell me a better modeling system other than blender? Thanks.
Please, no spam or flame just correctional critisizm or a rank of model 1-10/10 thanks!
Now for the model itself and wireframe.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/30crjo5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2d9uyxw.png[/img]
Thanks, Claunchii

item.title: Zod the immortal's sword
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

i recommend drop meta seq asap and then learn to use blender or c4d. or both if you want to get into animation.

Read full topic

item.title: Zod the immortal's sword
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

First post: read my post before you post okay.
Second post: yeah, i dont really like to use metaseq im trying blender now…
Third post: I might try wings 3d after i try blender and c4d.

Thanks. Could you tell me something i can do to fix my model?

Read full topic

item.title: Zod the immortal's sword
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I love the large amount of text he used.
In anycase, if you use metaseq for a bit, you will learn to like it. If not, try wings 3d, but that’s for pussys.
